name: Stealth Sensation
description:
A game where you can only use one sensation at a time.

With the (dis)ability to switch between Sight, Smell and Sound, you must find your way out of a Russian bunker by evading different threats that are all caught by the separate senses.

You can also morph into a box to avoid detection, as one does... 

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys -> Movement

E/Space -> Interaction

1,2,3 -> Switching sensations

Tab/LCtrl -> Hiding
